title: Game crashing before loading screen
body: Can anyone help me with this crashing problem, using windows 10. played league for years no problem, took a small break and now the game wont load (client is fine). I just get bugsplat instead of the game loading screen, tried repair tool and a reinstall both didn't work.

replies.body:
i'm having issues now too. i think it's because of my monitor but i don't know how to fix.
here are logs

The anniversary update made some kind of change to the Xbox Game Bar, and it's causing some players to crash out.  Go over[ this guide](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to disable it.  Hopefully, that will get you fixed up!

The answer can probably be found in the logs, or the bugsplat. (If you get any bugsplat, and it has logs, please post them.) You also have logs for every game. You will find it in C:/Riot Games/League of Legends/Game - R3d Logs (since you mentioned it's the game, not the client.), or wherever you installed League.  Every game has it's own log file, so it should be easy enough to find.

Anyways, if you'd like, just post logs corresponding to the game where it happens (or the bugsplat), there could be answers in there.
